ISSUE.TITLE: Browser can't load fb.js and fbsdk.js from Orchardcore.Facebook
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In Browser console i get this error. Refused to execute script from 'https://....../OrchardCore.Facebook/sdk/fbsdk.js' because its MIME type ('') is not executable, and strict MIME type checking is enabled.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add salmattia as a contributor for code (#17277)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Set ContentType in Facebook script Middleware Set ContentType to "text/javascript" when returning facebook scripts Fixes #17286
